content: This has to be the best prison in the area!  I highly recommend it to criminals downstate.

I enjoyed coming to the parking lot of Sing Sing with Robert Klein on an episode of Comedians in Cars Getting Coffee. I found the guards to be polite and accommodating. Even when they threatened legal action unless we removed ourselves from the premises. I would recommend this prison if you have to do hard time. Many reviews say I would return. Here that's called recidivism.

I bought a tank top saying SING SING off some dude in front of the mighty gate, selling merch out of his truck. Seemed legit.Keeping going a good job security guards. Oh and dont pick up any hitch hikers in the area. I mean, you never know.
A classic prison with rococo plinths.

Well I live right down the street so i give them all the props for keeping me safe and being one of the first houses they run to when a prisioner breaks out.  the other reason is that i live sooooo close that i feed of their gernerator so when others loose their lights.. I DON'T
